author: Special Correspondent
text:
The annual three-day annual sports and cultural meet conducted by Southern Railway Officers’ Association and Southern Railway Promotee Officers’ Association concluded on Sunday.

The event is being conducted for the sixth year and saw more than 350 officers of Southern Railway and their families taking part in different events.

Fifty six sports events and 16 cultural programmes were held. Vashishta Johri, general manager, Southern Railway presided over the function and distributed the prizes to winners, a press release said.

The overall sports championship was won by Headquarters (I) team led by S. Anantharaman, Chief Operations Manager, while the cultural championship was won by Palakkad Division, led by Anand Prakash, DRM.

The individual sports and cultural championship titles went to A.L. Prabhakar, ADRM, Chennai and Seena Raveendran of Palakkad, the press release added.
title: Railway officers hold annual sports meet
